system.description:
You have become not just a powerful representative of your principles and the natural world, but can pour out powerful wrath on those who draw it. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Half your druid levels count as herald level for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u220f22b3cpphtgb]{Empowered Smite}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.p9gkawegqqbxb821]{Greater Empowered Smite} features, both in terms of damage done and options available for empowered smites.

  • You gain an additional benefit based on your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sygit0xifd4lbg3g]{Natural Demeanor} choice.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xvy3sukz923x65c0]{A Way with Animals}, you learn the@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.h94zy649e1vquc53]{Phantom Steed} spell and can cast it once per short or long rest without using a spell slot. If you have 3rd-level or higher spell slots, it is always considered prepared and does not count against your spells prepared.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.38x8nxx6vunngklt]{First-Hand Naturalist}, when you perform the Gather Components or Hunt and Gather travel activities, on a success, you also receive the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.r9za0lmnarmx99nm]{Goodberry} spell as cast with a level 1 spell slot. This does not consume a spell slot. Once you have received this extra benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u67vj764a5luq9au]{Leyline Awareness}, your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.01szspr1nunp0lql]{Divine Sense} picks up the presence of magical items of rare or higher rarity in addition to whatever else it is tuned to.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xj8kt56dwiduj5as]{Scholar of the Old Ways}, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zc250942nlox9vyk]{Counterspell} spell and can cast it once per short or long rest without using a spell slot. If you have 3rd-level or higher spell slots, it is always considered prepared and does not count against your spells prepared.
